data.name: Humanizing Healthcare in the Digital Age
data.summary:
Attend this session and learn: 

How to raise awareness for the importance of telemedicine in a post COVID-19 world

How to build  a meaningful opportunity to make healthcare more personal and relationship-based through a digital platform

How to launch a mission-driven company during a pandemic
